note.p: Solicitor and justice of the peace. Son of Gideon Acland and Maria Lawford. Married Robina Jemima Maclean in Bombay (now Mumbai) in 1850. In Bombay until at least 1857. Of Langdown Lawn, Hythe, near Southampton, from at least 1861.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/671/108/5)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 18 January 2018)
England & Wales, non-conformist and non-parochial registers, 1567–1970 (Ancestry.com, accessed 18 January 2018)
India, select births and baptisms, 1786–1947 (E. M. E. Acland) (Ancestry.com, accessed 18 January 2018)
